articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Anirban Lahiri cards second 73 to miss cut at PGA Championships
articles.description: The morning wind took its toll as Anirban Lahiri hit a second straight three-over 73 to miss the cut at the PGA Championship, his first Major appearance in just under three years.
articles.content: Anirban Lahiri cards second 73 to miss cut at PGA Championships

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: France forward Kylian Mbappe to stay at PSG: Report
articles.description: Kylian Mbappe has decided to extend his stay at Paris St Germain, French sport daily L'Equipe reported on Saturday. The France forward, whose current contract expires on June 30, had been widely tipped to join Real Madrid.
articles.content: France forward Kylian Mbappe to stay at PSG: Report
